request.description: Implement all phases (1-5) of WorkoutLogger Validation Robustness fixes from PLAN_VALIDATION_ROBUSTNESS_FIXES_20251208. Target: improve score from 3.2/5 to 4.5/5. Phases: (1) Unit tests + JSDoc, (2) Type safety fixes, (3) Backend validator fixes, (4) Schema consistency, (5) Architectural improvements with explicit targetContacts and Zod schemas.
